name: Cadmium selenide
desc: Cadmium selenide is an inorganic compound with the formula CdSe. It is a black to red-black solid that is classified as a II-VI semiconductor of the n-type. Much of the current research on cadmium selenide is focused on its nanoparticles.

images.alt: Unit cell, ball and stick model of cadmium selenide
Sample of nanocrystalline cadmium selenide in a vial

Other anions:
Cadmium oxide,
Cadmium sulfide,
Cadmium telluride
